requirement.original: Convert TripAdvisor MCP to Claude skill for attractions and activities
requirement.clarified: Create a Claude skill that wraps TripAdvisor MCP and configure it for attractions and entertainment agents. The skill should handle attraction search, tours, reviews, and activity recommendations.
requirement.what: Create TripAdvisor skill using progressive disclosure pattern and integrate with attractions and entertainment agents
requirement.why: Enable comprehensive attraction and activity search with user reviews, ratings, ticket prices, and tour information

included: Create tripadvisor skill file with progressive disclosure pattern
Implement attraction and tour search tools
Set up secure credential management pattern

success_criteria: Attractions and entertainment agents configured to use skill
Credential management follows security best practices
constraints: Must integrate without breaking current functionality

root_cause_analysis.symptom: Attractions and entertainment agents lack detailed activity information
root_cause_analysis.root_cause: No integration with TripAdvisor for attraction reviews and tour information

development_approach.strategy: Create skill using progressive disclosure pattern. Configure 2 agents to invoke skill.

mcp_info.name: TripAdvisor MCP
tools: search_tours - Search for tours and experiences
get_reviews - Get user reviews and ratings
